item.description:
Join us for the 'South End Foraging Walk' and discover the diverse world of edible weeds growing along the edges of community gardens, parks and sidewalks. Bring your walking shoes and explore Boston’s forgotten harvest.

 

This workshop is part of our Seed, Sow & Grow 2012 program series. All Seed Sow & Grow programs are free and open to public. However, registration is required for all the workshops. Call 617-542-7696 or email: info@bostonnatural.org to register.

 

For more information about BNAN's full series of Seed Sow & Grow 2012 program, click here.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the entrance to the Mass Avenue T Station on the even numbered side of Mass Ave. across the street from the actual station entrance.
item.name: South End Foraging Walk
